question: Is it a sin to call the sister by her name as someone said to call sister by her name is sin for the wife and husband
answer:
QUESTION

I would like to ask if there is a gathering for sisters and a male is helping out at the end of the event and he calls the sister by her name and tells her to leave everything and us males will finish it all.  Is it a sin to call the sister by her name as someone said to call sister by her name is sin for the wife and husband.  Can you please advise

ANSWER


Share:

It is not a sin for the husband to call his wife by her actual name. Rasulullah [sallallaahu alayhi wasallam] used to address his wives by their names.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
